section.title: SetOffset and SetLimit
section.para: Select all nodes with primary type 'nt:unstructured' and returns only 3 nodes starting with the second node in the list.

section.title: Common info
section.para: QueryImpl class has two methods: one to indicate how many results shall be returned at most, and another to fix the starting position.

listitem.para: setOffset(long offset) - Sets the start offset of the result set.
setLimit(long position) - Sets the maximum size of the result set.

section.title: Repository structure
section.para: Repository contains mix:title nodes, where jcr:title has different values.

section.title: Query execution
Fetching result
section.para: In usual case (without using setOffset and setLimit methods), Node iterator returns all nodes (node1...node6). But in our case NodeIterator will return "node2","node3" and "node4".
